error.text: An error occurred while loading websites

NewSite.title: Create a new site

name.label: Site Title
name.description: The title of your WordPress site.

tagline.label: Site Tagline
tagline.description: A short description of your site.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: The theme to use for your WordPress site.

language.label: Language
language.description: Select at least one language for your site.

type.label: Site Type
type.description: Choose the type of WordPress site you want to create.

expiration.label: Site Expiration
expiration.description: Choose how long your site will be available.

debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug mode for development purposes.

success.text: Site successfully created! It is accessible at the following address:

notFound.subText: The page you are looking for does not exist

unauthorized.subText: You are not authorized to access this page

serverError.subText: An error occurred on the server
